comments.raw_text:
We need a page that we can send users to so that they can sign up to receive updates about the Mozilla Festival. I've created a pretty basic sign up form on BSD:

https://donate.mozilla.org/page/signup/festival-save-the-date

All users will go into one constituency group, users who indicate that they'd like to volunteer will go into two constituency groups (one to track their general interest and one to track their volunteer offer). 

This works, but could probably use some front-end polish.
